com.here.android.mpa.search

Class RatingMedia

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.search.Media
      • com.here.android.mpa.search.RatingMedia

  • public class RatingMedia
extends Media
    Represents rating content about a Place. Each individual Rating contains information about the rating itself, the user who contributed the rating, and a rating that the user offered for the place.
    See Also:
    Place.getRatings()
